name: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc.
summary: Advanced Micro Devices, Inc. (AMD) is a leading American multinational semiconductor company specializing in the design and development of CPUs, GPUs, FPGAs, and high-performance computing solutions for a wide range of markets including personal computing, data centers, gaming, and artificial intelligence. Founded in 1969, AMD is recognized for its innovation in microprocessors and graphics technology, and has a global workforce of 28,000 employees.
